sentences.sentence: “My father is Yorkshireman ” John Loring said.”
sentences.translation: “我父亲是约克郡人，”约翰•洛林 (John Loring) 说道。

sentences.sentence: You can spot an Irishman or a Yorkshireman by his brogue.
sentences.translation: 你们一听爱尔兰人或者约克郡人的土音，就能辨别出他是哪里的人。

sentences.sentence: The dentist appeared out of the night and the young yorkshireman in a mill of happy armed Frenchmen with wild faces.
sentences.translation: 牙医生从夜色中走了出来。那个年轻的约克郡人给围在一丛满脸激动、欢欣鼓舞的法国武装人员当中。
